title: Nice but...
text: My AA flight landed very late, so check in about 1 am.After first night (half the night actually) I had to change the room because I was only by myself but room was two bed equipped. No problem but there were no TV remote controler in the 'new' room (I asked for it twice with no succes).Bathroom fan was 'yelling' horribly.Rooms were clean and good looking.
